title: WELCOME TO THE FARM!!! Rice Planting Season naaaaa!

tasks.task: Observing and reporting on farming activities during the rainy season.
subtasks: Watching the opening of the irrigation system to commence planting.
Noticing workers engaged in manual hoeing due to soil conditions.
Following farmers as they use a manual plow.
Observing father and son working in the field through the afternoon, noting their fatigue.
Commenting on the difficulty and physical strain of continuous manual labor in agriculture during the rainy season.
